column5: My deepest condolences on your loss Albert. May you cherish the good memories forever my friend. Tony
Words are never enough.  Sorry for your loss Albert.  Be comforted by the fact she will live on through the person that you are and the comforting memories that you have.
So sorry for your loss Albert.
My deepest sympathies for your loss Albert.
sorry for your loss Albert
My condolences, very tough to loose a parent...
Sorry to hear of your loss Albert.  Please accept my sincerest condolences.
Sorry for you loss
My condolences
My condolences.

Thank you for your kind words everyone. We just got back from an amazing send off, which was ended off with a luncheon for 100+ . A Family tradition to take care of your guests after a long day, which started at 6:45 am.  I would like to express a special thanks to YRP for their detailed escort to various locations in York Region and an added special detail when the officers were at the end of their duty  at the gate to salute my mom's coffin as it entered Wesminster Cemetary. I hope F&A can relate as I have only met one of them on a pleasent and cordeal circumstances.  Again thanks to all.

Albert, I am so late but I can pass on my Condolences.. I can only repeat what Wayne had to say.. My Self and my Family send the Condolences..Be Strong and things will be well.. she is in a better place now..

I am so sorry and I want you to know I am thinking of you and what you and your family must be going through right now. Please accept my condolences. I can only imagine how difficult this must be for you.  Carry her memory forever in your heart.

Irish, we spoke while back about our  upcoming challanges in private and public. Today mine came to peaceful end. We are going to miss her.  Hopefully yours will come many , many years down the line, hopefully never.  To all  OFNers read  Irish's by line. how true.  A truly sad for our family , we have many years of memories.  Albert
Not sure who you lost K, but I'm very sorry.  Sounds like you will miss her and she meant alot to you.  My condolances.  Joey
Albert, I know not what you speak of, but I give you my sympathies.
Not 100% sure..... But if it is what I think it is you have my heartfelt condolences.
why is sadness so physically painful My deepest sympathy to your familly.  Paul

So sorry on the loss of your Mother Albert... as I said many weeks ago... she's proud of her family and you can take great comfort in that fact alone. All the best to you and yours... cherish the memories my friend..she'll always be with you at Sunday diner!  Wayne
Sorry for you loss Albert.  Glad you have some good memories to look back on.
I'm sorry for your loss Al
My condolences Albert....you now carry the torch to her Legacy...enjoy the stories you get to share with the future..  All the best to you and your family
My condolences.
My condolences Albert.
Sorry for your loss Albert.
My Condolences - each parent occupies a special place in our lives - and after it is our memory that keeps them alive.
Our family prayers are with you and your family.  Bob
sorry for your loss
As someone who recently lost a parent, chin up my friend.  The memories will live on for always.  Phil
My sincere condolences Albert.    I dread the day I'll have to go through this.
Condolances on the loss of you Mom.
I'm sorry for your loss.  My best wishes to you and your family.
Albert,  My condolences at the loss of your mother, I know how difficult this time must be for you and your family, you are in my thoughts and prayers.
My condolences to you on the loss of your mom.
A sad day, condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss Albert.
Sorry to hear of your loss, my condolences SBK
My condolences.
